Question: Aleees Texas LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Aleees Texas LLC CES 2024

- Manufacturer of lithium-iron phosphate (LFP) battery materials
- 17 years of experience in LFP cathode production
- Partnership with FREYR Battery for LFP cathode manufacturing joint venture
- Focus on establishing a localized, integrated supply chain of LFP lithium-ion battery materials
- Aim to commence production in 2024 coinciding with FREYR's anticipated ramp-up of operations
- Emphasis on sustainability, cost-effectiveness, and long-life cycle LFP cathode materials
- Holds more than 200 independent patents worldwide
- Customers include renowned energy storage battery and EV battery customers across Europe, US, and Asia
- Committed to providing first-class quality, safe, and reliable products
- Environmentally friendly, with major international certifications including ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO14064, IATF 16949, and corporate social responsibility AA1000
Summary_cn:
阿丽斯得克萨斯有限责任公司 CES 2024

- 锂铁磷酸(LFP)电池材料制造商
- 17年LFP正极生产经验
- 与FREYR Battery合作进行LFP正极的制造合资企业
- 注重建立本地化、一体化的LFP锂离子电池材料供应链
- 旨在2024年开始生产，与FREYR预计的运营加速相吻合
- 强调可持续性、成本效益和长寿命周期的LFP正极材料
- 在全球拥有200多项独立专利
- 客户包括欧洲、美国和亚洲的知名储能电池和电动汽车电池客户
- 致力于提供一流质量、安全可靠的产品
- 环境友好，拥有包括ISO9001、ISO14001、ISO14064、IATF 16949和企业社会责任AA1000在内的主要国际认证
